name: Planet Defender (itch) (Danial Jumagaliyev, JOSEPH QUESTED)
description:
Please download the game for the best quality and unexpected experience!

Defend planets from an alien invasion!

ControlsKey-bindsShootLMB (Left Mouse Button)MovementMouse Position

SPOILER ALERT! IF YOU HAVEN'T PLAYED THE GAME, DON'T SCROLL DOWN YET!

LAST WARNING!

I PROMISE THIS IS THE LAST WARNING!

You really had a crazy roller coaster ride, didn't you?

CREDITS:

All songs in the game (in the same order as you play):

  • JOSEPH QUESTED - SPACE EYED DAN
  • Di Young - Megalovania Remix
  • TeknoAxe - Until Your Engine Stops III
  • "C418 - Sweden" 8 bit cover by me

Sound effects:

  • Zapsplat
  • Some 8-bit sound effects were made using sfxr

Art assets:

  • Bit Pack by Kenney
  • Other art assets were made by me, and few were used from my previous projects
